page.title: 13 A Day in my Life
page.content: By Paul,aged 11. At 8 o'clock I get up & get washed,then I have my breakfast.After breakfast I go shopping where I usually get a World War Two model because models are my hobby.I also buy a bar of chocolate before I go home on a bus.Then I watch the television or go on the computer. After I have had lunch I exercise my rabbit in the garden & look at the fish pond which has a fountin & a waterfall. It is well stocked with fish.It has two carps,two comets & fourteen gold fish, one of which is a fantail & is five & a half years old. It is not an ordinary pond ,it's 3 feet deep & made of stone. I then construct my models. At about 8 o'clock I have supper & I read in bed.
